reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Improvement of water supply and services sanitation for vulnerable populations of the state of Kassala (wash)

description.narrative: Il progetto riguarda la riabilitazione dell’impianto di filtraggio del sistema di rifornimento dell’acqua e di alcuni impianti di distribuzione dell’acqua in ospedali e scuole a Girba e il miglioramento della gestione dei rifiuti in aree di forte afflusso di rifugiati, sfollati e migranti, con interventi a loro favore e coinvolgenti le comunità ospitanti.

The project concerns the rehabilitation of the water supply system and water distribution facilities in hospitals and schools in Girba and the improvement waste management in areas of strong influx of refugees, displaced persons and migrants.

IOM - ORGANIZZAZIONE INTERNAZIONALE PER LE MIGRAZIONI

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

sector.narrative: BASIC DRINKING WATER SUPPLY AND BASIC SANITATION

tag.narrative: By 2030, achieve universal and equitable access to safe and affordable drinking water for all
By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse
End poverty in all its forms everywhere
Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
Implement nationally appropriate social protection systems and measures for all, including floors, and by 2030 achieve substantial coverage of the poor and the vulnerable
